caption.p: Effect of KS domain expression on seed germination and early seedling growth in Arabidopsis. a Germination rates of wild type and transgenic lines at 36 h of imbibition. b The 4-day seedling length of WT and OE lines. WT wild type, OE overexpression lines. Values are reported as the means of 10 biological replicates along with standard deviation. The means with the same letters are not statistically significantly different. Statistical analysis of the results was conducted using the one-way analysis of variance ( P < 0.05)
